posts.post_title: Wanted: T206 Southern Leaguers, PSA graded
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Adam
Looking to pick up a few T206 southern leaguers graded either PSA 1, PSA 2 or PSA 3.  I can care less about the back of the card.  Please email me at aamoniz@yahoo.com if you have any you'd like to sell.

Regards,
Adam
